tanFa : [L1Size] -> [xSize][xSize] -> [508] -> [Round] -> Bit
tanFa L1 x k i =
  (L1 ! (x @ 0)) ^ (L1 ! (x @ 1)) ^ ((L1 ! (x @ 2)) && (L1 ! (x @ 3))) ^ ((L1 ! (x @ 4)) && ((iR @ 0) @ i)) ^ (k @ (k_a_index @ i))
tanFb : [L2Size] -> [ySize][ySize] -> [508] -> [Round] -> Bit
tanFb L2 y k i =
  (L2 ! (y @ 0)) ^ (L2 ! (y @ 1)) ^ (L2 ! (y @ 2) && L2 ! (y @ 3)) ^ (L2 ! (y @ 4) && L2 ! (y @ 5)) ^ (k @ (k_b_index @ i))
tanAplyFb : [L1Size] ->
  [L2Size] ->
  [ySize][ySize] -> [KatanKeySize] -> [Round] -> [L1Size]
tanAplyFb l1 l2 y key i =
  (l1 !! [ (L1Size - 2), (L1Size - 3) .. 0]) # [(tanFb l2 y
    (keySchedule' key) i)]
tanAplyFa : [L1Size] ->
  [L2Size] ->
  [xSize][xSize] -> [KatanKeySize] -> [Round] -> [L2Size]
tanAplyFa l1 l2 x key i =
  (l2 !! [ (L2Size - 2), (L2Size - 3) .. 0]) # [(tanFa l1 x
    (keySchedule' key) i)]
updateLfsrTan : [L1Size] ->
  [L2Size] ->
  [xSize][xSize] ->
  [ySize][ySize] ->
  [KatanKeySize] -> [Round] -> ([L1Size], [L2Size])
updateLfsrTan l1 l2 x y key i =
  if `L1Size == 13
  then (l1', l2')
  else if `L1Size == 19 then (l1'', l2'') else (l1''', l2''')
  where
    pt = (tanAplyFb l1 l2 y key i) # (tanAplyFa l1 l2 x key i)
    l1' = (splitBlock pt).0
    l2' = (splitBlock pt).1
    pt' = (tanAplyFb l1' l2' y key i) # (tanAplyFa l1' l2' x key i)
    l1'' = (splitBlock pt').0
    l2'' = (splitBlock pt').1
    pt'' =
      (tanAplyFb l1'' l2'' y key i) # (tanAplyFa l1'' l2'' x key i)
    l1''' = (splitBlock pt'').0
    l2''' = (splitBlock pt'').1
katantanEncrypt : ([KatanKeySize], [KatanBlock]) -> [KatanBlock]
katantanEncrypt (key, pt) =
  (hs ! 0).0 # (hs ! 0).1
  where
    hs =
      [ (l1, l2)] # [((updateLfsrTan pT.0 pT.1 x y key i).0,
      (updateLfsrTan pT.0 pT.1 x y key i).1) | i <- [0, 1 .. 253]
                                             | pT <- hs]
    l1 = (splitBlock pt).0
    l2 = (splitBlock pt).1
decTanFa : [L1Size] ->
  [L2Size] -> [xSize][xSize] -> [508] -> [Round] -> Bit
decTanFa L1 L2 x k i =
  fa ^ (L1 ! ((x @ 1) + 1)) ^ (L1 ! ((x @ 2) + 1) && L1 ! ((x @ 3) + 1)) ^ (L1 ! ((x @ 4) + 1) && ((iR @ 0) @ i)) ^ k @ (k_a_index @ i)
  where
    fa = L2 ! 0
decTanFb : [L2Size] ->
  [L1Size] -> [ySize][ySize] -> [508] -> [Round] -> Bit
decTanFb L2 L1 y k i =
  fb ^ (L2 ! ((y @ 1) + 1)) ^ ((L2 ! ((y @ 2) + 1)) && L2 ! ((y @ 3) + 1)) ^ ((L2 ! ((y @ 4) + 1)) && L2 ! ((y @ 5) + 1)) ^ k @ (k_b_index @ i)
  where
    fb = L1 ! 0
tanAplydecFa : [L1Size] ->
  [L2Size] ->
  [xSize][xSize] -> [KatanKeySize] -> [Round] -> [L1Size]
tanAplydecFa l1 l2 x k i =
  [(decTanFa l1 l2 x (keySchedule' k) i)] # (l1 !! [ (L1Size -
  1),
                                                     (L1Size - 2) .. 1])
tanAplydecFb : [L2Size] ->
  [L1Size] ->
  [ySize][ySize] -> [KatanKeySize] -> [Round] -> [L2Size]
tanAplydecFb l2 l1 y k i =
  [(decTanFb l2 l1 y (keySchedule' k) i)] # (l2 !! [ (L2Size -
  1),
                                                     (L2Size - 2) .. 1])
decUpdateLfsrTan : [L1Size] ->
  [L2Size] ->
  [xSize][xSize] ->
  [ySize][ySize] ->
  [KatanKeySize] -> [Round] -> ([L1Size], [L2Size])
decUpdateLfsrTan l1 l2 x y key i =
  if `L1Size == 13
  then (l1', l2')
  else if `L1Size == 19 then (l1'', l2'') else (l1''', l2''')
  where
    ct = (tanAplydecFa l1 l2 x key i) # (tanAplydecFb l2 l1 y key i)
    l1' = (splitBlock ct).0
    l2' = (splitBlock ct).1
    ct' =
      (tanAplydecFa l1' l2' x key i) # (tanAplydecFb l2' l1' y key i)
    l1'' = (splitBlock ct').0
    l2'' = (splitBlock ct').1
    ct'' =
      (tanAplydecFa l1'' l2'' x key i) # (tanAplydecFb l2'' l1'' y key
        i)
    l1''' = (splitBlock ct'').0
    l2''' = (splitBlock ct'').1
katantanDecrypt : ([KatanKeySize], [KatanBlock]) -> [KatanBlock]
katantanDecrypt (key, pt) =
  (hs ! 0).0 # (hs ! 0).1
  where
    hs =
      [ (l1, l2)] # [((decUpdateLfsrTan pT.0 pT.1 x y key i).0,
      (decUpdateLfsrTan pT.0 pT.1 x y key i).1) | i <- [253, 252 .. 0]
                                                | pT <- hs]
    l1 = (splitBlock pt).0
    l2 = (splitBlock pt).1
/* pragma katantanCorrect : property */
katantanCorrect key m =
  katantanDecrypt (key, katantanEncrypt (key, m)) == m

type Katan64 = 64
type KatanBlock = Katan64
type KatanKeySize = 80
type Round = 8
type xSize = 5

type L2Size = 39

splitBlock : [KatanBlock] -> ([L1Size], [L2Size])
splitBlock pt =
  (l1, l2)
  where
    l1 = take`{L1Size} pt
    l2 = drop`{L1Size} pt
iR : [1][Nr]
iR =

kS : {a} (fin a) => ([a], [12]) -> [a + 1]
kS (key, i) =

kS10 : {a} (fin a) => ([a], [12]) -> [a + 10]

kS100 : {a} (fin a) => ([a], [12]) -> [a + 100]
kS100 (key, i) =

    key1 = kS10 (key0, i + 10)
    key2 = kS10 (key1, i + 20)

    key5 = kS10 (key4, i + 50)

keySchedule' : [80] -> [508]
keySchedule' key =
  key13

    key0 = kS100 (key, 80)

    key2 = kS100 (key1, 280)
    key3 = kS100 (key2, 380)

funFa : [L1Size] -> [xSize][xSize] -> [508] -> [Round] -> Bit
funFa L1 x k i =
  (L1 ! (x @ 0)) ^ (L1 ! (x @ 1)) ^ ((L1 ! (x @ 2)) && (L1 ! (x @ 3))) ^ ((L1 ! (x @ 4)) && ((iR @ 0) @ i)) ^ (k @ (pmult
    (2 : [2]) i))
funFb : [L2Size] -> [ySize][ySize] -> [508] -> [Round] -> Bit
funFb L2 y k i =
  (L2 ! (y @ 0)) ^ (L2 ! (y @ 1)) ^ (L2 ! (y @ 2) && L2 ! (y @ 3)) ^ (L2 ! (y @ 4) && L2 ! (y @ 5)) ^ (k @ ((pmult
    (2 : [2]) i) + 1))
aply_fb : [L1Size] ->
  [L2Size] ->
  [ySize][ySize] -> [KatanKeySize] -> [Round] -> [L1Size]
aply_fb l1 l2 y key i =

    (keySchedule' key) i)]
aply_fa : [L1Size] ->
  [L2Size] ->
  [xSize][xSize] -> [KatanKeySize] -> [Round] -> [L2Size]
aply_fa l1 l2 x key i =
  (l2 !! [ (L2Size - 2), (L2Size - 3) .. 0]) # [(funFa l1 x

updateLfsr l1 l2 x y key i =

  else if `L1Size == 19 then (l1'', l2'') else (l1''', l2''')

    pt = (aply_fb l1 l2 y key i) # (aply_fa l1 l2 x key i)

    pt'' = (aply_fb l1'' l2'' y key i) # (aply_fa l1'' l2'' x key i)
    l1''' = (splitBlock pt'').0
    l2''' = (splitBlock pt'').1

tanFa L1 x k i =
  (L1 ! (x @ 0)) ^ (L1 ! (x @ 1)) ^ ((L1 ! (x @ 2)) && (L1 ! (x @ 3))) ^ ((L1 ! (x @ 4)) && ((iR @ 0) @ i)) ^ (k @ (k_a_index @ i))
tanFb : [L2Size] -> [ySize][ySize] -> [508] -> [Round] -> Bit
tanFb L2 y k i =
  (L2 ! (y @ 0)) ^ (L2 ! (y @ 1)) ^ (L2 ! (y @ 2) && L2 ! (y @ 3)) ^ (L2 ! (y @ 4) && L2 ! (y @ 5)) ^ (k @ (k_b_index @ i))
tanAplyFb : [L1Size] ->

  [ySize][ySize] -> [KatanKeySize] -> [Round] -> [L1Size]
tanAplyFb l1 l2 y key i =
  (l1 !! [ (L1Size - 2), (L1Size - 3) .. 0]) # [(tanFb l2 y
    (keySchedule' key) i)]
tanAplyFa : [L1Size] ->
  [L2Size] ->
  [xSize][xSize] -> [KatanKeySize] -> [Round] -> [L2Size]
tanAplyFa l1 l2 x key i =

updateLfsrTan : [L1Size] ->
  [L2Size] ->
  [xSize][xSize] ->
  [ySize][ySize] ->
  [KatanKeySize] -> [Round] -> ([L1Size], [L2Size])
updateLfsrTan l1 l2 x y key i =
  if `L1Size == 13
  then (l1', l2')
  else if `L1Size == 19 then (l1'', l2'') else (l1''', l2''')
  where
    pt = (tanAplyFb l1 l2 y key i) # (tanAplyFa l1 l2 x key i)

    l2' = (splitBlock pt).1
    pt' = (tanAplyFb l1' l2' y key i) # (tanAplyFa l1' l2' x key i)
    l1'' = (splitBlock pt').0
    l2'' = (splitBlock pt').1
    pt'' =
      (tanAplyFb l1'' l2'' y key i) # (tanAplyFa l1'' l2'' x key i)
    l1''' = (splitBlock pt'').0
    l2''' = (splitBlock pt'').1
katantanEncrypt : ([KatanKeySize], [KatanBlock]) -> [KatanBlock]
katantanEncrypt (key, pt) =
  (hs ! 0).0 # (hs ! 0).1
  where
    hs =
      [ (l1, l2)] # [((updateLfsrTan pT.0 pT.1 x y key i).0,
      (updateLfsrTan pT.0 pT.1 x y key i).1) | i <- [0, 1 .. 253]
                                             | pT <- hs]
    l1 = (splitBlock pt).0
    l2 = (splitBlock pt).1

funFa L1 x k i =
  (L1 ! (x @ 0)) ^ (L1 ! (x @ 1)) ^ ((L1 ! (x @ 2)) && (L1 ! (x @ 3))) ^ ((L1 ! (x @ 4)) && ((iR @ 0) @ i)) ^ (k @ (pmult
    (2 : [2]) i))
funFb : [L2Size] -> [ySize][ySize] -> [508] -> [Round] -> Bit
funFb L2 y k i =
  (L2 ! (y @ 0)) ^ (L2 ! (y @ 1)) ^ (L2 ! (y @ 2) && L2 ! (y @ 3)) ^ (L2 ! (y @ 4) && L2 ! (y @ 5)) ^ (k @ ((pmult
    (2 : [2]) i) + 1))
aply_fb : [L1Size] ->
  [L2Size] ->
  [ySize][ySize] -> [KatanKeySize] -> [Round] -> [L1Size]
aply_fb l1 l2 y key i =
  (l1 !! [ (L1Size - 2), (L1Size - 3) .. 0]) # [(funFb l2 y
    (keySchedule' key) i)]
aply_fa : [L1Size] ->
  [L2Size] ->
  [xSize][xSize] -> [KatanKeySize] -> [Round] -> [L2Size]
aply_fa l1 l2 x key i =
  (l2 !! [ (L2Size - 2), (L2Size - 3) .. 0]) # [(funFa l1 x
    (keySchedule' key) i)]
updateLfsr : [L1Size] ->
  [L2Size] ->
  [xSize][xSize] ->
  [ySize][ySize] ->
  [KatanKeySize] -> [Round] -> ([L1Size], [L2Size])
updateLfsr l1 l2 x y key i =
  if `L1Size == 13
  then (l1', l2')
  else if `L1Size == 19 then (l1'', l2'') else (l1''', l2''')
  where
    pt = (aply_fb l1 l2 y key i) # (aply_fa l1 l2 x key i)
    l1' = (splitBlock pt).0
    l2' = (splitBlock pt).1
    pt' = (aply_fb l1' l2' y key i) # (aply_fa l1' l2' x key i)
    l1'' = (splitBlock pt').0
    l2'' = (splitBlock pt').1
    pt'' = (aply_fb l1'' l2'' y key i) # (aply_fa l1'' l2'' x key i)
    l1''' = (splitBlock pt'').0
    l2''' = (splitBlock pt'').1
katanEncrypt : ([KatanKeySize], [KatanBlock]) -> _
katanEncrypt (key, pt) =
  (hs ! 0).0 # (hs ! 0).1
  where
    hs =
      [ (l1, l2)] # [((updateLfsr pT.0 pT.1 x y key i).0,
      (updateLfsr pT.0 pT.1 x y key i).1) | i <- [0, 1 .. 253]
                                          | pT <- hs]
    l1 = (splitBlock pt).0
    l2 = (splitBlock pt).1
katan64_1 =
  katanEncrypt (0xffffffffffffffffffff, zero) == 0x21f2e99c0fab828a

type Katan64 = 64
type KatanBlock = Katan64
type KatanKeySize = 80
type Round = 8
type xSize = 5
type ySize = 6
type Nr = 254
type L1Size = 25
type L2Size = 39
x = [ 24, 15, 20, 11, 9]
y = [ 38, 25, 33, 21, 14, 9]
splitBlock : [KatanBlock] -> ([L1Size], [L2Size])
splitBlock pt =
  (l1, l2)
  where
    l1 = take`{L1Size} pt
    l2 = drop`{L1Size} pt
iR : [1][Nr]
iR =
  [0b11111110001101010101111011001100101001000100011000111100001000010100000111110011111101010001010100110000110011101111101110100101011010011100110110001011101101111001011011010111001001001101000111000100111101000011101011000001011001000000110111000000010010]
kS : {a} (fin a) => ([a], [12]) -> [a + 1]
kS (key, i) =
  key # [((key @ (i - 80)) ^ (key @ (i - 61)) ^ (key @ (i - 50)) ^ (key @ (i - 13)))]
kS10 : {a} (fin a) => ([a], [12]) -> [a + 10]
kS10 (key, i) =
  key9
  where
    key0 = kS (key, i)
    key1 = kS (key0, i + 1)
    key2 = kS (key1, i + 2)
    key3 = kS (key2, i + 3)
    key4 = kS (key3, i + 4)
    key5 = kS (key4, i + 5)
    key6 = kS (key5, i + 6)
    key7 = kS (key6, i + 7)
    key8 = kS (key7, i + 8)
    key9 = kS (key8, i + 9)
kS100 : {a} (fin a) => ([a], [12]) -> [a + 100]
kS100 (key, i) =
  key9
  where
    key0 = kS10 (key, i)
    key1 = kS10 (key0, i + 10)
    key2 = kS10 (key1, i + 20)
    key3 = kS10 (key2, i + 30)
    key4 = kS10 (key3, i + 40)
    key5 = kS10 (key4, i + 50)
    key6 = kS10 (key5, i + 60)
    key7 = kS10 (key6, i + 70)
    key8 = kS10 (key7, i + 80)
    key9 = kS10 (key8, i + 90)
keySchedule' : [80] -> [508]
keySchedule' key =
  key13
  where
    key0 = kS100 (key, 80)
    key1 = kS100 (key0, 180)
    key2 = kS100 (key1, 280)
    key3 = kS100 (key2, 380)
    key4 = kS10 (key3, 480)
    key5 = kS10 (key4, 490)
    key6 = kS (key5, 500)
    key7 = kS (key6, 501)
    key8 = kS (key7, 502)
    key9 = kS (key8, 503)
    key10 = kS (key9, 504)
    key11 = kS (key10, 505)
    key12 = kS (key11, 506)
    key13 = kS (key12, 507)
funFa : [L1Size] -> [xSize][xSize] -> [508] -> [Round] -> Bit
funFa L1 x k i =
  (L1 ! (x @ 0)) ^ (L1 ! (x @ 1)) ^ ((L1 ! (x @ 2)) && (L1 ! (x @ 3))) ^ ((L1 ! (x @ 4)) && ((iR @ 0) @ i)) ^ (k @ (pmult
    (2 : [2]) i))
funFb : [L2Size] -> [ySize][ySize] -> [508] -> [Round] -> Bit
funFb L2 y k i =
  (L2 ! (y @ 0)) ^ (L2 ! (y @ 1)) ^ (L2 ! (y @ 2) && L2 ! (y @ 3)) ^ (L2 ! (y @ 4) && L2 ! (y @ 5)) ^ (k @ ((pmult
    (2 : [2]) i) + 1))
aply_fb : [L1Size] ->
  [L2Size] ->
  [ySize][ySize] -> [KatanKeySize] -> [Round] -> [L1Size]
aply_fb l1 l2 y key i =
  (l1 !! [ (L1Size - 2), (L1Size - 3) .. 0]) # [(funFb l2 y
    (keySchedule' key) i)]
aply_fa : [L1Size] ->
  [L2Size] ->
  [xSize][xSize] -> [KatanKeySize] -> [Round] -> [L2Size]
aply_fa l1 l2 x key i =
  (l2 !! [ (L2Size - 2), (L2Size - 3) .. 0]) # [(funFa l1 x
    (keySchedule' key) i)]
updateLfsr : [L1Size] ->
  [L2Size] ->
  [xSize][xSize] ->
  [ySize][ySize] ->
  [KatanKeySize] -> [Round] -> ([L1Size], [L2Size])
updateLfsr l1 l2 x y key i =
  if `L1Size == 13

  else if `L1Size == 19 then (l1'', l2'') else (l1''', l2''')

    l1'' = (splitBlock pt').0
    l2'' = (splitBlock pt').1
    pt'' = (aply_fb l1'' l2'' y key i) # (aply_fa l1'' l2'' x key i)
    l1''' = (splitBlock pt'').0
    l2''' = (splitBlock pt'').1
katanEncrypt : ([KatanKeySize], [KatanBlock]) -> _
katanEncrypt (key, pt) =
  (hs ! 0).0 # (hs ! 0).1
  where
    hs =
      [ (l1, l2)] # [((updateLfsr pT.0 pT.1 x y key i).0,
      (updateLfsr pT.0 pT.1 x y key i).1) | i <- [0, 1 .. 253]

KeySchedule : {Nw, r}
  (fin Nw, fin r, Nw >= 3) =>
    [Nw][64] -> [2][64] -> [r][Nw][64]
KeySchedule k [ t0, t1] =
  take`{r} [subkey s | s <- [0 ...]]
  where
    k' = k # [foldl (^) C240 k]
    t' = [ t0, t1, t0 ^ t1]
    subkey : [64] -> [Nw][64]
    subkey s = take`{Nw} (k' <<< s) + tweak s
    tweak : [64] -> [Nw][64]
    tweak s = zero # take`{2} (t' <<< s) # [s]
C240 : [64]
C240 = 0x1bd11bdaa9fc1a22

gf28Pow : GF28 -> [8] -> GF28
gf28Pow n k =
  if k == 0

  else (if (k && 1) == 1 then gf28Mult n w else w

          w = gf28Mult v v)

mp_mod_inv : {a} (fin a, a >= 1) => Z a -> Z a
mp_mod_inv c =
  if c == 0
  then error "Zero does not have a multiplicative inverse"
  else fromInteger (if u'' == 1 then x1'' else x2'')
  where
    innercond (a, x) = isEven a
    innerbody (a, x) =
      (a / 2, if isEven x then x / 2 else (x + `a) / 2)
    outtercond (u, v, x1, x2) = (u != 1) /\ (v != 1)
    outterbody (u, v, x1, x2) =
      if (u' >= v')
      then (u' - v', v', x1' - x2' % `a, x2')
      else (u', v' - u', x1', x2' - x1' % `a)
      where
        (u', x1') = while innercond innerbody (u, x1)
        (v', x2') = while innercond innerbody (v, x2)
    (u'', _, x1'', x2'') =
      while outtercond outterbody (fromZ c, `a, 1, 0)

  {rho : [256],

  t0 : intPolyVec k}
type SEEDBYTES = 32
Gen : [3 * SEEDBYTES * 8] -> (PublicKey, SecretKey)
Gen s =
  (pk, sk)
  where
    [ rho, rho', K] = split`{3} s
    A = ExpandA (split rho)
    s1 = PolyUniformEtaV`{dim = l} rho' zero
    s2 = PolyUniformEtaV`{dim = k} rho' `l
    s1ntt = map ntt s1
    As1 = map nttinv (nttMatMul A s1ntt)
    t = paddV As1 s2
    (t1, t0) = Power2RoundV t
    tr = CRH (rho # (pack_t1 t1))
    pk = {rho = rho, t1 = t1}
    sk = {rho = rho, K = K, tr = tr, s1 = s1, s2 = s2, t0 = t0}
test_key_gen =
  (pk.rho # (pack_t1
    pk.t1) == testCase1.pk) /\ ((sk.rho # sk.K # sk.tr # (pack_polyeta
    sk.s1) # (pack_polyeta sk.s2) # (pack_t0 sk.t0)) == testCase1.sk)
  where
    (pk, sk) = Gen (join testCase1.seed)
pack_polyeta : {m} (fin m, m >= 1) => polyVec m -> [4 * n * m]
pack_polyeta s =
  join [join [elt p i | i <- [0 .. (n / 2) - 1] : [_][8]] | p <- s]
  where
    elt : poly -> [8] -> [8]
    elt p i =
      (c (((p @ (2 * i + 0))) % `q)) || ((c
        (((p @ (2 * i + 1))) % `q)) << 4)
    c : [qbits] -> [8]
    c num = drop (if num > eta then `q + eta - num else eta - num)
pack_t0 : intPolyVec k -> [k * 3584]
pack_t0 t0 = join [polyt0_pack p | p <- t0]
polyt0_pack : intPoly -> [3584]
polyt0_pack p =
  join
    [join
      [drop`{15} (tmp p i 0),
      drop`{15} (((tmp p i 0) >> 8) || ((tmp p i 1) << 6)),
      drop`{15} ((tmp p i 1) >> 2),
      drop`{15} (((tmp p i 1) >> 10) || ((tmp p i 2) << 4)),
      drop`{15} ((tmp p i 2) >> 4),
      drop`{15} (((tmp p i 2) >> 12) || ((tmp p i 3) << 2)),

    xs @ 1 >> 7 || xs @ 2 << 2,
    xs @ 2 >> 6 || xs @ 3 << 3,
    xs @ 3 >> 5 || xs @ 4 << 4,

PolyUniformEtaV r nonce =

genS byte =

    t0 = drop`{4} (byte && 0x0f)

PolyUniformEta : [SEEDBYTES][8] -> [16] -> poly
PolyUniformEta rho nonce =
  map
    (\x ->
    if ((toInteger eta) - (toInteger x)) < 0
    then (fromInteger (((toInteger eta) - (toInteger x)) + `q) : [23])
    else (fromInteger ((toInteger eta) - (toInteger x)) : [23]))
    (take`{n} withinEta)
  where
    seed = (join rho) # (drop`{8} nonce) # (take`{8} nonce)
    randoms =
      ((join
        (SHA3::toBytes
          (take`{2 * 8 * 168}
            (SHA3::SHAKE128 (join (SHA3::toBytes seed)))))) # zero)
    withinEta = randomsInRangeDouble genS (2 * eta) randoms

CRH seed =

matrixPoly : [SEEDBYTES * 8] -> [width k] -> [width l] -> nttPoly
matrixPoly rho i j =
  take`{n} [drop`{1} elt | elt <- randomElts]
  where
    randomElts = randomsInRange extractMatElt ((>=) (`q)) (s # zero)
    s =
      join
        (SHA3::toBytes
          (take`{6720} (SHA3::SHAKE128 (join (SHA3::toBytes (rho # b))))))
    b = drop`{16} ((((zero # j) : [32]) << 8) + ((zero # i) : [32]))
extractMatElt : [24] -> [24]
extractMatElt rands =
  (zero # (2 ^^ 16 * b2' + 2 ^^ 8 * b1 + b0)) : [24]
  where
    [ b0, b1, b2] = [(zero # b) : [23] | b <- split`{3} rands]
    b2' = (2 ^^ 23 - 1) && b2

  where
    r' = mod_pow (zero # q, r, 1)

randomsInRange : {a}
  (fin a) =>
    ([a] -> [a]) -> ([a] -> Bit) -> [inf] -> [inf][a]
randomsInRange createElt upperCrit randoms =
  if (upperCrit elt)
  then [elt] # (randomsInRange createElt upperCrit randomTail)
  else randomsInRange createElt upperCrit randomTail
  where
    elt = createElt (take`{a} randoms)
    randomTail = drop`{a} randoms
randomsInRangeDouble : {a}
  (fin a) =>
    ([2 * a] -> [2][a]) -> [a] -> [inf] -> [inf][a]
randomsInRangeDouble createElt upper randoms =
  if (elts @ 0 <= upper) /\ (elts @ 1 <= upper)
  then elts # (randomsInRangeDouble createElt upper randomTail)
  else if (elts @ 0 <= upper)
  then [elts @ 0] # (randomsInRangeDouble createElt upper
    randomTail)
  else if (elts @ 1 <= upper)
  then [elts @ 1] # (randomsInRangeDouble createElt upper
    randomTail)
  else randomsInRangeDouble createElt upper randomTail

    elts = createElt (take`{2 * a} randoms)
    randomTail = drop`{2 * a} randoms
mod_sum : {s, m} (fin s, fin m) => ([s], [m][s]) -> [s]
mod_sum (p, l) =
  sums ! 0

ntt : poly -> nttPoly
ntt p =
  nttp
  where
    r k = mod_pow (`q, rootOfUnity, k)
    exponents =
      join
        [[zext i, (256 + (zext i))] | i <- [reverse
                                     ((128 + i) : [8]) | i <- [0 .. 127]]]
    nttp =
      [(mod_sum
        (`q,
        [(mod_mul
          (`q, (p @ idx), (mod_pow (`q, (r k), i)))) | idx <- [0 .. (n -
                                                    1)] : [n][width n]
                                                     | i <- [0 .. (n -
                                                    1)] : [n][23]])) | k <- exponents]
nttinv : nttPoly -> poly
nttinv p' =
  p
  where
    pu = reorder p'
    r' i = mod_pow (`q, rootOfUnityInv, (i * 2))

      [mod_mul
        (`q,
        ninv,
        mod_mul
          (`q,
          mod_pow (`q, rootOfUnityInv, i),
          (mod_sum
            (`q,
            [mod_mul (`q, (pu @ jdx), (r' ((i * j)))) | jdx <- [0 .. (n -
                                                     1)] : [n][width n]
                                                      | j <- [0 .. (n -
                                                     1)] : [n][qbits]])))) | i <- [0 .. 255] : [n][qbits]]
reorder : nttPoly -> nttPoly
reorder a =
  join [[a1 @ i, a2 @ i] | i <- [0 .. 127] : [_][8]]
  where
    a1 =
      a @@ [(i - 1) / 2 | i <- [reverse
                         ((128 + i) : [8]) | i <- [0 .. 127]]]
    a2 =
      reverse
        (a @@ [((511 - (zero # i)) : [9]) / 2 | i <- [reverse
                                               ((128 + i) : [8]) | i <- [0 .. 127]]])

nttMatMul mat vec = [nttDotProduct v vec | v <- mat]
nttDotProduct : {dim}

nttDotProduct v1 v2 =

nttPolyMult : nttPoly -> nttPoly -> nttPoly
nttPolyMult p1 p2 = [mod_mul (`q, x, y) | x <- p1 | y <- p2]

padd p1 p2 = [mod_add (`q, x, y) | x <- p1 | y <- p2]

extractPolyElt : [40] -> [2][20]
extractPolyElt bits =
  [ zero # int1, zero # int2]
  where
    [ b0, b1, b2, b3, b4] =
      [(zero # b) : [20] | b <- split bits : [5][8]]
    int1 = b2' * 2 ^^ 16 + b1 * 2 ^^ 8 + b0
    int2 = b4 * 2 ^^ 12 + b3 * 2 ^^ 4 + b2''
    b2' = b2 && 15
    b2'' = b2 / 16

type qbits = 23
type q = 8380417
type n = 256
Power2Round : [qbits] -> ([qbits], [qbits]) -> ([qbits], [qbits])
Power2Round q (r, d') =
  ((r' - r0) / 2 ^^ d', r0)
  where
    r' = mod_pow (zero # q, r, 1)
    r0 = centered_mod r' (2 ^^ d')
centered_mod : [qbits] -> [qbits] -> [qbits]
centered_mod x n =
  if r > (n / 2) then r - n else r
  where
    r = x % n

randomsInRange : {a}
  (fin a) =>
    ([a] -> [a]) -> ([a] -> Bit) -> [inf] -> [inf][a]
randomsInRange createElt upperCrit randoms =
  if (upperCrit elt)
  then [elt] # (randomsInRange createElt upperCrit randomTail)
  else randomsInRange createElt upperCrit randomTail
  where
    elt = createElt (take`{a} randoms)
    randomTail = drop`{a} randoms

randomsInRange : {a}
  (fin a) =>
    ([a] -> [a]) -> ([a] -> Bit) -> [inf] -> [inf][a]

  if (upperCrit elt)
  then [elt] # (randomsInRange createElt upperCrit randomTail)
  else randomsInRange createElt upperCrit randomTail
  where
    elt = createElt (take`{a} randoms)
    randomTail = drop`{a} randoms

randomsInRanges : {a, m}
  (fin a, fin m, m >= 1) =>
    ([a] -> [a]) -> [m][a] -> [inf] -> [inf][a]
randomsInRanges createElt uppers randoms =
  if elt <= head uppers
  then [elt] # (randomsInRanges createElt uppersRotate randomTail)
  else randomsInRanges createElt uppers randomTail
  where
    elt = createElt (take`{a} randoms)
    randomTail = drop`{a} randoms
    uppersRotate = uppers <<< 1

    randomTail = drop`{a} randoms
    uppersRotate = uppers <<< 1

randomsInRangeDouble : {a}
  (fin a) =>
    ([2 * a] -> [2][a]) -> [a] -> [inf] -> [inf][a]
randomsInRangeDouble createElt upper randoms =
  if (elts @ 0 <= upper) /\ (elts @ 1 <= upper)
  then elts # (randomsInRangeDouble createElt upper randomTail)
  else if (elts @ 0 <= upper)
  then [elts @ 0] # (randomsInRangeDouble createElt upper
    randomTail)
  else if (elts @ 1 <= upper)
  then [elts @ 1] # (randomsInRangeDouble createElt upper
    randomTail)
  else randomsInRangeDouble createElt upper randomTail
  where
    elts = createElt (take`{2 * a} randoms)
    randomTail = drop`{2 * a} randoms

reorder : nttPoly -> nttPoly
reorder a =
  join [[a1 @ i, a2 @ i] | i <- [0 .. 127] : [_][8]]
  where
    a1 =
      a @@ [(i - 1) / 2 | i <- [reverse
                         ((128 + i) : [8]) | i <- [0 .. 127]]]

  gf28Add [ (b >>> 2), (b >>> 5), (b >>> 7), d]
  where
    d = 0x05
InvSubByte : GF28 -> GF28
InvSubByte b = gf28Inverse (xformByte' b)
InvSubBytes : State -> State
InvSubBytes state = [[InvSubByte b | b <- row] | row <- state]

type Nb = 4
type GF28 = [8]
type State = [4][Nb]GF28
gf28Add : {n} (fin n) => [n]GF28 -> GF28
gf28Add ps =
  sums ! 0
  where
    sums = [zero] # [p ^ s | p <- ps | s <- sums]
irreducible = <| x^^8 + x^^4 + x^^3 + x + 1 |>
gf28Mult : (GF28, GF28) -> GF28
gf28Mult (x, y) = pmod (pmult x y) irreducible
gf28DotProduct : {n} (fin n) => ([n]GF28, [n]GF28) -> GF28
gf28DotProduct (xs, ys) =
  gf28Add [gf28Mult (x, y) | x <- xs | y <- ys]
gf28VectorMult : {n, m}
  (fin n) =>
    ([n]GF28, [m][n]GF28) -> [m]GF28
gf28VectorMult (v, ms) = [gf28DotProduct (v, m) | m <- ms]
gf28MatrixMult : {n, m, k}
  (fin m) =>
    ([n][m]GF28, [m][k]GF28) -> [n][k]GF28
gf28MatrixMult (xss, yss) =
  [gf28VectorMult (xs, yss') | xs <- xss]
  where
    yss' = transpose yss
MixColumns : State -> State
MixColumns state =
  gf28MatrixMult (m, state)
  where
    m = [ [2, 3, 1, 1], [1, 2, 3, 1], [1, 1, 2, 3], [3, 1, 1, 2]]

type GF28 = [8]
irreducible = <| x^^8 + x^^4 + x^^3 + x + 1 |>
gf28Mult : (GF28, GF28) -> GF28
gf28Mult (x, y) = pmod (pmult x y) irreducible
gf28Pow : (GF28, [8]) -> GF28
gf28Pow (n, k) =
  pow k
  where
    sq x = gf28Mult (x, x)
    odd x = x ! 0
    pow i =
      if i == 0
      then 1
      else if odd i
      then gf28Mult (n, sq (pow (i >> 1)))
      else sq (pow (i >> 1))
Rcon : [8] -> [4]GF28
Rcon i = [ (gf28Pow (<| x |>, i - 1)), 0, 0, 0]

type KeySchedule = (RoundKey, [Nr - 1]RoundKey, RoundKey)
fromKS : KeySchedule -> [Nr + 1][4][32]
fromKS (f, ms, l) =
  [formKeyWords (transpose k) | k <- [f] # ms # [l]]
  where
    formKeyWords bbs = [join bs | bs <- bbs]

type Nb = 4

gf28Add : {n} (fin n) => [n]GF28 -> GF28
gf28Add ps =
  sums ! 0
  where
    sums = [zero] # [p ^ s | p <- ps | s <- sums]
irreducible = <| x^^8 + x^^4 + x^^3 + x + 1 |>
gf28Mult : (GF28, GF28) -> GF28
gf28Mult (x, y) = pmod (pmult x y) irreducible
gf28DotProduct : {n} (fin n) => ([n]GF28, [n]GF28) -> GF28
gf28DotProduct (xs, ys) =
  gf28Add [gf28Mult (x, y) | x <- xs | y <- ys]
gf28VectorMult : {n, m}
  (fin n) =>
    ([n]GF28, [m][n]GF28) -> [m]GF28
gf28VectorMult (v, ms) = [gf28DotProduct (v, m) | m <- ms]
gf28MatrixMult : {n, m, k}
  (fin m) =>
    ([n][m]GF28, [m][k]GF28) -> [n][k]GF28
gf28MatrixMult (xss, yss) =
  [gf28VectorMult (xs, yss') | xs <- xss]
  where
    yss' = transpose yss
SubByte' : GF28 -> GF28
SubByte' b = sbox @ b
SubBytes : State -> State
SubBytes state = [[SubByte' b | b <- row] | row <- state]
ShiftRows : State -> State
ShiftRows state =
  [row <<< shiftAmount | row <- state
                       | shiftAmount <- [0 .. 3]]
MixColumns : State -> State
MixColumns state =
  gf28MatrixMult (m, state)
  where
    m = [ [2, 3, 1, 1], [1, 2, 3, 1], [1, 1, 2, 3], [3, 1, 1, 2]]
AddRoundKey : (RoundKey, State) -> State
AddRoundKey (rk, s) = rk ^ s
AESRound : (RoundKey, State) -> State
AESRound (rk, s) =
  AddRoundKey (rk, MixColumns (ShiftRows (SubBytes s)))

type Nb = 4
type GF28 = [8]
type State = [4][Nb]GF28
type RoundKey = State
gf28Add : {n} (fin n) => [n]GF28 -> GF28
gf28Add ps =
  sums ! 0
  where
    sums = [zero] # [p ^ s | p <- ps | s <- sums]
irreducible = <| x^^8 + x^^4 + x^^3 + x + 1 |>
gf28Mult : (GF28, GF28) -> GF28
gf28Mult (x, y) = pmod (pmult x y) irreducible
gf28Pow : (GF28, [8]) -> GF28
gf28Pow (n, k) =
  pow k
  where
    sq x = gf28Mult (x, x)
    odd x = x ! 0
    pow i =
      if i == 0
      then 1
      else if odd i
      then gf28Mult (n, sq (pow (i >> 1)))
      else sq (pow (i >> 1))
gf28Inverse : GF28 -> GF28
gf28Inverse x = gf28Pow (x, 254)
gf28DotProduct : {n} (fin n) => ([n]GF28, [n]GF28) -> GF28
gf28DotProduct (xs, ys) =
  gf28Add [gf28Mult (x, y) | x <- xs | y <- ys]
gf28VectorMult : {n, m}
  (fin n) =>
    ([n]GF28, [m][n]GF28) -> [m]GF28
gf28VectorMult (v, ms) = [gf28DotProduct (v, m) | m <- ms]
gf28MatrixMult : {n, m, k}
  (fin m) =>
    ([n][m]GF28, [m][k]GF28) -> [n][k]GF28
gf28MatrixMult (xss, yss) =
  [gf28VectorMult (xs, yss') | xs <- xss]
  where
    yss' = transpose yss
xformByte' : GF28 -> GF28
xformByte' b =
  gf28Add [ (b >>> 2), (b >>> 5), (b >>> 7), d]
  where
    d = 0x05
InvSubByte : GF28 -> GF28
InvSubByte b = gf28Inverse (xformByte' b)
InvSubBytes : State -> State
InvSubBytes state = [[InvSubByte b | b <- row] | row <- state]
InvShiftRows : State -> State
InvShiftRows state =
  [row >>> shiftAmount | row <- state
                       | shiftAmount <- [0 .. 3]]
InvMixColumns : State -> State
InvMixColumns state =
  gf28MatrixMult (m, state)
  where
    m =
      [ [0x0e, 0x0b, 0x0d, 0x09], [0x09, 0x0e, 0x0b, 0x0d],
        [0x0d, 0x09, 0x0e, 0x0b], [0x0b, 0x0d, 0x09, 0x0e]]
AddRoundKey : (RoundKey, State) -> State
AddRoundKey (rk, s) = rk ^ s
AESInvRound : (RoundKey, State) -> State
AESInvRound (rk, s) =
  InvMixColumns (AddRoundKey (rk, InvSubBytes (InvShiftRows s)))

type AES128 = 4
type Nk = AES128
type Nb = 4
type Nr = 6 + Nk
type AESKeySize = (Nk * 32)
type GF28 = [8]
type State = [4][Nb]GF28
type RoundKey = State
type KeySchedule = (RoundKey, [Nr - 1]RoundKey, RoundKey)
gf28Add : {n} (fin n) => [n]GF28 -> GF28
gf28Add ps =
  sums ! 0
  where
    sums = [zero] # [p ^ s | p <- ps | s <- sums]
irreducible = <| x^^8 + x^^4 + x^^3 + x + 1 |>
gf28Mult : (GF28, GF28) -> GF28
gf28Mult (x, y) = pmod (pmult x y) irreducible
gf28Pow : (GF28, [8]) -> GF28
gf28Pow (n, k) =
  pow k
  where
    sq x = gf28Mult (x, x)
    odd x = x ! 0
    pow i =
      if i == 0
      then 1
      else if odd i
      then gf28Mult (n, sq (pow (i >> 1)))
      else sq (pow (i >> 1))
gf28Inverse : GF28 -> GF28
gf28Inverse x = gf28Pow (x, 254)
gf28DotProduct : {n} (fin n) => ([n]GF28, [n]GF28) -> GF28
gf28DotProduct (xs, ys) =
  gf28Add [gf28Mult (x, y) | x <- xs | y <- ys]
gf28VectorMult : {n, m}
  (fin n) =>
    ([n]GF28, [m][n]GF28) -> [m]GF28
gf28VectorMult (v, ms) = [gf28DotProduct (v, m) | m <- ms]
gf28MatrixMult : {n, m, k}
  (fin m) =>
    ([n][m]GF28, [m][k]GF28) -> [n][k]GF28
gf28MatrixMult (xss, yss) =
  [gf28VectorMult (xs, yss') | xs <- xss]
  where
    yss' = transpose yss
xformByte' : GF28 -> GF28
xformByte' b =
  gf28Add [ (b >>> 2), (b >>> 5), (b >>> 7), d]
  where
    d = 0x05
SubByte' : GF28 -> GF28
SubByte' b = sbox @ b
SubBytes : State -> State
SubBytes state = [[SubByte' b | b <- row] | row <- state]
InvSubByte : GF28 -> GF28
InvSubByte b = gf28Inverse (xformByte' b)
InvSubBytes : State -> State
InvSubBytes state = [[InvSubByte b | b <- row] | row <- state]
ShiftRows : State -> State
ShiftRows state =
  [row <<< shiftAmount | row <- state

InvShiftRows : State -> State
InvShiftRows state =
  [row >>> shiftAmount | row <- state
                       | shiftAmount <- [0 .. 3]]
MixColumns : State -> State
MixColumns state =
  gf28MatrixMult (m, state)
  where
    m = [ [2, 3, 1, 1], [1, 2, 3, 1], [1, 1, 2, 3], [3, 1, 1, 2]]
InvMixColumns : State -> State
InvMixColumns state =
  gf28MatrixMult (m, state)
  where
    m =

ExpandKeyForever seed =

keyWS : [Nk][4][8] -> [inf][4][8]
keyWS seed =

                                      | old <- xs]
ExpandKey : [AESKeySize] -> KeySchedule
ExpandKey key =

AESFinalRound : (RoundKey, State) -> State

AESInvRound : (RoundKey, State) -> State
AESInvRound (rk, s) =

AESFinalInvRound : (RoundKey, State) -> State

XXH32 : {L} (fin L) => [L][8] -> [32] -> [32]
XXH32 input seed =
  XXH32_avalanche acc1
  where
    stripes16 # stripes4 # stripes1 = input
    accR =
      foldl XXH32_rounds (XXH32_init seed)
        (split stripes16 : [L / 16][16][8])
    accL =
      `(L % 2 ^^ 32) + if (`L : Integer) < 16
      then seed + PRIME32_5
      else XXH32_converge accR
    acc4 =
      foldl XXH32_digest4 accL (split stripes4 : [(L % 16) / 4][4][8])
    acc1 = foldl XXH32_digest1 acc4 (stripes1 : [L % 4][8])
XXH32_avalanche acc0 =
  acc5
  where
    acc1 = acc0 ^ (acc0 >> 15)
    acc2 = acc1 * PRIME32_2
    acc3 = acc2 ^ (acc2 >> 13)
    acc4 = acc3 * PRIME32_3
    acc5 = acc4 ^ (acc4 >> 16)
XXH32_avalanche : [32] -> [32]
XXH32_digest1 acc lane =
  ((acc + (0 # lane) * PRIME32_5) <<< 11) * PRIME32_1
XXH32_digest1 : [32] -> [8] -> [32]
XXH32_digest4 acc lane =
  ((acc + toLE lane * PRIME32_3) <<< 17) * PRIME32_4
XXH32_digest4 : [32] -> [4][8] -> [32]
XXH32_converge [ acc1, acc2, acc3, acc4] =
  (acc1 <<< 1) + (acc2 <<< 7) + (acc3 <<< 12) + (acc4 <<< 18)
XXH32_converge : [4][32] -> [32]
XXH32_rounds accs stripe =
  [XXH32_round accN (toLE laneN) | accN <- accs
                                 | laneN <- split stripe]
XXH32_rounds : [4][32] -> [16][8] -> [4][32]
XXH32_round accN laneN =
  ((accN + laneN * PRIME32_2) <<< 13) * PRIME32_1
XXH32_round : [32] -> [32] -> [32]
XXH32_init seed =
  [ acc1, acc2, acc3, acc4]
  where
    acc1 = seed + PRIME32_1 + PRIME32_2
    acc2 = seed + PRIME32_2
    acc3 = seed + 0
    acc4 = seed - PRIME32_1
XXH32_init : [32] -> [4][32]
PRIME32_5 = 0x165667b1 : [32]
PRIME32_4 = 0x27d4eb2f : [32]
PRIME32_3 = 0xc2b2ae3d : [32]
PRIME32_2 = 0x85ebca77 : [32]
PRIME32_1 = 0x9e3779b1 : [32]
toLE bytes = join (reverse bytes)

mulRange : {m, n}
  (fin m, fin n, m >= 1, n >= 1) =>
    ([m], [m]) -> ([n], [n]) -> ([m + n], [m + n])
mulRange (xl, xh) (yl, yh) =
  (zl, zh)
  where
    (xlyl, xlyh) = scaleRange xl (yl, yh)
    (xhyl, xhyh) = scaleRange xh (yl, yh)
    zl = smin xlyl xhyl
    zh = smax xlyh xhyh
scaleRange : {m, n}
  (fin m, fin n, m >= 1, n >= 1) =>
    [m] -> ([n], [n]) -> ([m + n], [m + n])
scaleRange k (lo, hi) =
  if k <$ 0 then (hi', lo') else (lo', hi')
  where
    lo' = sext k * sext lo
    hi' = sext k * sext hi

type Dom n = {lo : [n], sz : [n]}
interval : {n} (fin n) => [n] -> [n] -> Dom n
interval l s = {lo = l, sz = s}
range : {n} (fin n) => [n] -> [n] -> Dom n
range lo hi = interval lo (hi - lo)
ubounds : {n} (fin n) => Dom n -> ([n], [n])
ubounds a =
  if carry a.lo a.sz then (0, ~0) else (a.lo, a.lo + a.sz)

udiv a b =
  range cl ch
  where
    (al, ah) = ubounds a
    (bl, bh) = ubounds b
    bl' = max 1 bl
    bh' = max 1 bh
    cl = al / bh'
    ch = ah / bl'

  if ql == qh then range rl rh else interval 0 (bh - 1)

    (ql, rl) = (al / bh', al % bh')
    (qh, rh) = (ah / bl', ah % bl')

ult_sum_common_equiv : {n}
  (fin n) =>
    Dom n -> Dom n -> Dom n -> Bit
ult_sum_common_equiv a b c =
  if al == ah /\ bl == bh /\ al == bl
  then True
  else if ~(carry cl c.sz)
  then check_same_wrap_interval cl ch
  else check_same_wrap_interval cl
    mask`{n} /\ check_same_wrap_interval 0 ch
  where
    (cl, ch) = (c.lo, c.lo + c.sz)
    (al, ah) = ubounds a
    (bl, bh) = ubounds b
    check_same_wrap_interval lo hi =
      ~(carry ah hi) /\ ~(carry bh hi) \/ carry al lo /\ carry bl lo

unknowns : {n} (fin n, n >= 1) => Dom n -> [n]

  if carry a.lo a.sz then ~0 else bits

smin : {a} (SignedCmp a) => a -> a -> a
smin x y = if x <$ y then x else y
smax : {a} (SignedCmp a) => a -> a -> a
smax x y = if x >$ y then x else y
smem : {n} (fin n, n >= 1) => ([n], [n]) -> [n] -> Bit
smem (lo, hi) x = lo <=$ x /\ x <=$ hi
mulRange : {m, n}
  (fin m, fin n, m >= 1, n >= 1) =>
    ([m], [m]) -> ([n], [n]) -> ([m + n], [m + n])
mulRange (xl, xh) (yl, yh) =
  (zl, zh)
  where
    (xlyl, xlyh) = scaleRange xl (yl, yh)
    (xhyl, xhyh) = scaleRange xh (yl, yh)
    zl = smin xlyl xhyl
    zh = smax xlyh xhyh
scaleRange : {m, n}
  (fin m, fin n, m >= 1, n >= 1) =>
    [m] -> ([n], [n]) -> ([m + n], [m + n])
scaleRange k (lo, hi) =
  if k <$ 0 then (hi', lo') else (lo', hi')
  where
    lo' = sext k * sext lo
    hi' = sext k * sext hi
correct_mulRange : {n}
  (fin n, n >= 1) =>
    ([n], [n]) -> ([n], [n]) -> [n] -> [n] -> Bit
correct_mulRange a b x y =
  smem a x ==> smem b y ==> smem (mulRange a b) (sext x * sext y)

type Dom n = {lo : [n], sz : [n]}
interval : {n} (fin n) => [n] -> [n] -> Dom n
interval l s = {lo = l, sz = s}
range : {n} (fin n) => [n] -> [n] -> Dom n
range lo hi = interval lo (hi - lo)
mem : {n} (fin n) => Dom n -> [n] -> Bit
mem a x = x - a.lo <= a.sz
ubounds : {n} (fin n) => Dom n -> ([n], [n])
ubounds a =
  if carry a.lo a.sz then (0, ~0) else (a.lo, a.lo + a.sz)
udiv : {n} (fin n, n >= 1) => Dom n -> Dom n -> Dom n
udiv a b =
  range cl ch
  where
    (al, ah) = ubounds a
    (bl, bh) = ubounds b
    bl' = max 1 bl
    bh' = max 1 bh
    cl = al / bh'
    ch = ah / bl'
correct_udiv : {n}
  (fin n, n >= 1) =>
    Dom n -> Dom n -> [n] -> [n] -> Bit
correct_udiv a b x y =
  mem a x ==> mem b y ==> y != 0 ==> mem (udiv a b) (x / y)

  mem a x ==> mem b y ==> y != 0 ==> mem (urem a b) (x % y)

      if (`a == 2)
